name: The Land Between Game DEMO
description:
THE LAND BETWEEN DEMO

Play through the condensed Demo of Chapter 1 in this Adventure Game.

The Land Between is a 3d Puzzle Platform Jumper. The adventure leads Grace, the lost child, through different parts of this magical world, full of adventure, danger, and exploration.

Discover the mystery of the Sozo, the Red Striped Lion, as he helps Grace overcome her fears, her past, and the journey ahead. 

Interested in joining the journey, for updates and release information... 

Click here: THE LAND BETWEEN GAME

Join our Community: SAS Facebook Community

Help us make this game better: DEMO Feedback Form

Join Our Discord for bug fixes: Debugging Discord
